scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop | npm run db:create | npm run knex:migrate:latest | npm run seed
scripts.db:drop: echo 'DROP DATABASE home_automation_test; \n DROP DATABASE home_automation' | psql
scripts.db:create:
echo 'CREATE DATABASE home_automation_test; 
 CREATE DATABASE home_automation' | psql
scripts.migrate: npx knex --esm migrate:latest --env test --knexfile src/data/knexfile.ts && npx knex --esm migrate:latest --env development --knexfile src/data/knexfile.ts
scripts.rollback: npx knex --esm migrate:rollback --env test --knexfile src/data/knexfile.ts && npx knex --esm migrate:rollback --env development --knexfile src/data/knexfile.ts
scripts.knex:migrate:latest: npx knex --esm --knexfile src/data/knexfile.ts migrate:latest --env test && npx knex --esm --knexfile src/data/knexfile.ts migrate:latest --env development
scripts.knex:migrate:rollback: npx knex --esm --knexfile src/data/knexfile.ts migrate:rollback --env test && npx knex --esm --knexfile src/data/knexfile.ts migrate:rollback --env development
